mapper.select: SELECT pro.names as product_name,pro.norms,pro.unit,pro.factory,stock.num, DATE_FORMAT(stock.create_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as create_time,user_name FROM stock stock LEFT JOIN product pro ON pro.id = stock.product_id ORDER BY stock.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stock (product_id, product_name, num, create_time, user_name, user_id) VALUES (#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=TINYINT}, NOW(), #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=TINYINT})
